properties.title: Ancient Mayan, Aztec and American Indians
properties.description: Ear candling, in which a paper cone covered in beeswax is held between the ear and a small flame, is a popular treatment. The effect of the cone and the heat are believed to draw out impurities from the ear, nose and throat. This practice is still alive today and some spas even offer the service, but many people perceive it as dangerous, or simply doubt that it even works at all.
